abce.agency.async
Interface AsyncUpdate

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncPricingFirm, Consumer, ECJProdPriceFirm, ECProdPriceFirm, Firm, IteratedCournotAgentGA, PerfectlyRationalConsumer, ReluctantSwitcher, SimpleFirm, Temporal, TemporalArrayList, TemporalBitMap2D, TemporalBitSet, TemporalHashMap, TemporalHashSet, TemporalObjectGrid2D, TemporalSparseGrid2D
public interface AsyncUpdate

When agents update data upon which other agents will take action, syncronously updating these values at decision time potentially creates race conditions. To avoid this problem, Simternet agents (and their data objects) implement this interface to separate the decision process from the resulting changes to data structures. The updates are committed to the underlying data structures when the update method is called by the Arbiter.

Author:
kkoning
See Also:
simternet.engine.asyncdata.Arbiter

Method Summary
 void update()
          Commit the changes made to this object to the underlying data structure.
 

Method Detail

update

void update()
Commit the changes made to this object to the underlying data structure. For example, if the implementing object is a hash map, it should apply all the changes it has saved and deferred to the backing HashMap.
